author: James Tanner
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. Heat the oil in an ovenproof frying pan and sear the chicken breast on all sides until golden-brown, about 4-5 minutes. Add the garlic cloves, chopped chillies and honey to the pan, stir, and transfer to the oven to cook for 8-10 minutes, or until the chicken is completely cooked through. To serve, place the chicken onto a serving plate with the green beans and drizzle over the pan juices. Scatter with toasted almonds and serve.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  1 chicken breast, skin on,  2 garlic cloves, skin on, lightly crushed with the flat of a knife,  Â½ each green and red chilli, chopped,  2 tbsp clear honey,  green beans, blanched,  1 tbsp toasted flaked almonds
